text: The RemoteAddrValve class has some new boolean attributes (addConnectorPort, invalidAuthenticationWhenDeny, addConnectorPort, invalidAuthenticationWhenDeny) but the accessors are not mbean-friendly. 'is' should be used instead of 'get'.
creator: alexis.hassler@sewatech.fr

text:
PR sent (#66) : 
- replace the getInvalidAuthenticationWhenDeny with isInvalidAuthenticationWhenDeny in RequestFilterValve 
- replace getAddConnectorPort with isAddConnectorPort in RemoteAddrValve
creator: alexis.hassler@sewatech.fr

text:
This has been fixed in:
- trunk for 9.0.0.M23 onwards
- 8.5.x for 8.5.17 onwards
- 8.0.x for 8.0.45 onwards
- 7.0.x for 7.0.79 onwards
creator: markt@apache.org
